snippet: The pension can now share in Bridgewater's upside returns without paying the high costs, but it also is betting on the long-term viability of a hedge fund linked to one enigmatic founder.
abstract: The pension can now share in Bridgewater's upside returns without paying the high costs, but it also is betting on the long-term viability of a hedge fund linked to one enigmatic founder.

headline.main: Texas Teacher Pension Buys Bridgewater Stake
headline.print_headline: Texas Teacher Pension Buys Part of Bridgewater Hedge Fund
